channel.title: Spring on René Reitmann
channel.description: Recent content in Spring on René Reitmann

item.title: Metadatamagement (April 2015 - today)
item.description: As a member of the DZHW I was part of a 5 person team as Scrum Master, Full Stack Developer and DevOp that developed a search portal for social science research data. We are currently operating and developing this portal further. The entire development process takes place openly at GitHub.

item.title: Global Order and Transport Management (January 2011 - November 2011)
item.description: As an employee of Zühlke Engineering, I was one of 10 architects involved in the development of the central system for the worldwide processing of transport orders for a logistics service provider. About 100 people worked on the entire development project.
